title: Síochána Act 2005 (Section 42) (Special Inquiry relating to the Garda Síochána)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (Section 42)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (Section 42) 
(Special Inquiry relating to the Garda Síochána) (No. 2) (Amendment) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited garda siochana act 2005 (section 42) (special inquiry relating garda siochana) (no 2) (amendment) order

title: Síochána Act 2005 (Section 42) (Special Inquiry relating to the Garda Síochána)
Síochána Act 2005 (Section 42) (Special Inquiry relating to the Garda Síochána)
heading: In this Order -
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order - 

“inquiry” means the inquiry referred to in Article 2 of the Order of 2017; 

“Order of 2017” means the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (Section 42) (Special 
Inquiry relating to the Garda Síochána) (No. 2) Order 2017 (S.I. No. 197 of 
2017). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [11] 3
text_norm: 2 order - inquiry mean inquiry referred article 2 order 2017 order 2017 mean garda siochana act 2005 (section 42) (special inquiry relating garda siochana) (no 2) order 2017 (s.i no 197 2017) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 14th january 2022 11 3

title: Síochána Act 2005 (Section 42) (Special Inquiry relating to the Garda Síochána)
heading: Judge Michael Coghlan, retired judge of the District Court, is hereby
text_raw:
3. 

Judge Michael Coghlan, retired judge of the District Court, is hereby 

appointed to - 

(a) 

continue the inquiry, and 

(b) make a report to the Minister on the conclusion of the inquiry.
text_norm: 3 judge michael coghlan retired judge district court hereby appointed - (a) continue inquiry (b) make report minister conclusion inquiry

title: Síochána Act 2005 (Section 42) (Special Inquiry relating to the Garda Síochána)
heading: 4. The terms of reference of the inquiry are those specified in the Schedule
text_raw:
4. The terms of reference of the inquiry are those specified in the Schedule 

to the Order of 2017. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 January, 2022. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [11]
